yellow-day_one-default.text: We've all been w-waiting to hear your solution... you do have one, d-don't you?
yellow-day_one-default.speaker: yellow

meeting_day_one-yes.text: (You have decided to sacrifice innocent lives to try to stop the moon)
meeting_day_one-yes.speaker: yellow

meeting_day_one-no.text: (You have decided to not sacrifice innocent lives)
meeting_day_one-no.speaker: yellow
